somnambulantmod: DreamJournal.NAME: Dream Journal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you rest at a campsite, raise your Max HP by #b2 and upgrade a random card in your deck.

somnambulantmod: DementingVeil.NAME: Dementing Veil
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, exhaust all cards in your hand.

somnambulantmod: GluedMask.NAME: Glued Mask
somnambulantmod: GluedMask.FLAVOR: It helps you see things as they should be.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] . At the beginning of combat, add 2 Nightmares to your draw pile. Nightmares can not be played.

somnambulantmod: BrokenTimepiece.NAME: Broken Timepiece
somnambulantmod: BrokenTimepiece.FLAVOR: Trust no other to wake you but a working timepiece.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a Dream is exhausted, gain 3 Strength.

somnambulantmod: MemoirOfAnother.NAME: Memoir of Another
somnambulantmod: MemoirOfAnother.FLAVOR: Proper literature for a dream out of bounds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you rest, you may add a card of another color to your deck. If you have a 'Dream Catcher', add a Somnambulant card to the options and upgrade them.

somnambulantmod: MemoryHouse.NAME: Memory House
somnambulantmod: MemoryHouse.FLAVOR: A place to keep them safe.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, add 2 Dreams to your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: SleepingPills.NAME: Sleeping Pills
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards created from Dreams cost 0 until end of combat.

somnambulantmod: RunicStrip.NAME: Runic Strip
somnambulantmod: RunicStrip.FLAVOR: Infinite objects can be somewhat tiring.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy gains strength, gain 3 Mental Barrier.

somnambulantmod: CiphersPen.NAME: Cipher's Pen
somnambulantmod: CiphersPen.FLAVOR: The pen writes its meaning true.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you create a Dream or Nightmare, upgrade it.

somnambulantmod: PrivatePocket.NAME: Private Pocket
somnambulantmod: PrivatePocket.FLAVOR: Everyone has the right to their private pocket.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain 1 Mental Barrier.
